title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake’s Development Hell - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.03.22
description:
Greg and Tim talk about Prince of Persia switching developers, Nintendo expecting to sell fewer Switches this year, and Tomb Raider's sales.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:11 - Housekeeping

REGGIE is on the Kinda Funny Gamescast talking about his new book Disrupting the Game and answering all of Tim’s nerdy Nintendo questions!

Later today we will have a SPOILER-FREE review of Doctor Strange and the Multiverse of Madness on YouTube.com/KindaFunny and on podcast services around the globe when you search for Kinda Funny Screencast!

The Roper Report  -

00:06:26 - Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake Changes Devs
00:14:33 - Nintendo expecting to sell fewer Switches this year
00:22:42 - Ads
00:25:40 - PAX East Enforcer Dies from COVID after the ShowTomb Raider Sales Revealed
00:29:35 - Tomb Raider Sales Revealed
00:33:20 - REQUIRED READING: https://bit.ly/3vCqb60
00:39:30 - Sonic Prime First Look
00:46:24 - Out today
00:56:13 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Janet
